players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Suspicious behavior from Alice, keep an eye on her."
Diana: "I'll watch Alice closely, as Charlie suggested. Keep your suspicions open."
You: "Observing everyone, will discuss findings tonight."
You: "Noticing Diana's and Charlie's vigilance, will discuss findings tonight. Stay alert."
Diana: "Noting Charlie's suspicion & Alice's keen observation, stay vigilant. I'm the detective."
Charlie: "Staying cautious, Alice and Diana seem suspicious. Keep investigating."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Suspicious behavior from Alice, keep an eye on her."
Diana: "I'll watch Alice closely, as Charlie suggested. Keep your suspicions open."
Alice: "Observing everyone, will discuss findings tonight."
Alice: "Noticing Diana's and Charlie's vigilance, will discuss findings tonight. Stay alert."
Diana: "Noting Charlie's suspicion & Alice's keen observation, stay vigilant. I'm the detective."
You: "Staying cautious, Alice and Diana seem suspicious. Keep investigating."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Suspicious behavior from Alice, keep an eye on her."
You: "I'll watch Alice closely, as Charlie suggested. Keep your suspicions open."
Alice: "Observing everyone, will discuss findings tonight."
Alice: "Noticing Diana's and Charlie's vigilance, will discuss findings tonight. Stay alert."
You: "Noting Charlie's suspicion & Alice's keen observation, stay vigilant. I'm the detective."
Charlie: "Staying cautious, Alice and Diana seem suspicious. Keep investigating."
